item.title: Silab Client Pk skulls/Prayer
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Ferri Mr. Ferri
item.description:
@Mr_Ferri wrote:

I have a problem, i added Player skulls, and i get invisible text (doesnt show above head). How do i fix so the skull actually appears above head.

This is the TUTORIAL I USED;
I TAKE ABSOULUTLY NO CREDIT! just here to show what i used!

Step 1
Inside client.java search for

public void PKz() {

Below

				[code]if(givePoints) {[/code]

Add this

					[code]killerz.headIcon = newheadicon2;
					killerz.headIcon = 8;
					killerz.skulltimer = 4000;
					killerz.updateRequired = true;
					killerz.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/code]

Step 2
Add this int:

[code]public int skulltimer = 0;[/code]

Step 3
Find…

void process

Or

boolean process

Below it add this to make the timer work

	[code]if (skulltimer <= 0) {
		headIcon = newheadicon2;
		headIcon = 0;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}
	if (skulltimer > 0) {
		skulltimer--;
	}[/code]

Read full topic
